entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Kinngait
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:19 a.m. EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -6.1Â°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 1:28 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High zero.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:28 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 1:28 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023
